pullrequest.title: Issue#96 Add Thrust Angle and Rotation Joint

content.raw:
In [4b7fe53](#!/osrf/vrx/commits/4b7fe535809269e68b401ea8a3c081f135630ef0), I reshow instructions after a certain number of speed updates, matching [https://github.com/ros-teleop/teleop\_twist\_keyboard/blob/master/teleop\_twist\_keyboard.py](https://github.com/ros-teleop/teleop_twist_keyboard/blob/master/teleop_twist_keyboard.py).

This PR should be complete, as long as it has been tested with keyboard and joystick.
content.html:
